div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

a.span: Dimmitt ISD Hosting Virtual Job Fair

div.p: Dimmitt ISD is hosting a Virtual Employment Job Fair for future employees. View the link below to see what our district has to offer and follow the steps to register. We...
We hope you are not just surviving but thriving. These are scary times but we have so much for which to be grateful. There is an amazing site I wanted to share with all of...

Audiciones de DMS cheerleader/mascot seran virtualmente mayo 11.Audiciones para todo estudiante entrando 7-8.Para mas informacion del las audicion o Google Classroom Code en via correo electronico Sra. St. Clair lestclair@dimmittisd.net o visite nuestro sitio web/Facebook.

DMS Cheerleader/Mascot tryouts will be held virtually May 11th.Tryouts are open to all incoming 7th & 8th graders More information/Google Classroom code to access tryout material can be obtained by emailing Ms. St. Clair lestclair@dimmittisd.net or visit our website/Facebook

Good Morning!
DISD will not be serving or delivering meals to students on Friday, April 10th and Monday, April 13th due to the Easter Holiday. We will resume meal service and deliveries on Tuesday, April 14th. I hope you have a blessed Easter weekend.
Good morning! Please check the DISD website or Facebook for an update on grading and attendance policies.

Chromebooks and packets can be picked up today and Monday from 8-12 in front of Richardson Elementary. Also, students are not required to be present to pick up a meal. The government has lifted that restriction. Meals are available Monday through Friday from 9-11 behind Richardson Elementary.
Stay Healthy!
